MajorClaims.MC1: CCTV cameras should be installed in every premise to combat the ever increasing theft rate and to protect the workers at the workplace
MajorClaims.MC2: CCTV cameras are essential and therefore must be installed in every premise

Claims.C1: This is chiefly to shield oneself from being harmed by any intruders or robbers
Claims.C2: CCTVs must be put in all workplace so that crime rates can be minimized
Claims.C3: these cameras can help to provide some form of protection to the workers against the customers
Claims.C4: Those opposing the CCTV systems feel that their privacies are invaded with the constant monitoring of the cameras

Premises.P1: privacies are lost with the use of these cameras
Premises.P2: safety should be put first in order to be safe
Premises.P3: by having CCTV cameras at workplace, crimes such as robbery can be trimmed down
Premises.P4: when a shop is attacked by thieves, the clips taken by these cameras serve as a source of evidence to help the thieves to be traced
Premises.P5: in Malaysia, policemen used the videos captured by the CCTV cameras to trace and successfully catch a group of robbers who broke into a Seven Eleven shop during the midnight
Premises.P6: as the employees know that they are under constant surveillance, they will less likely steal from the shops
Premises.P7: the installation of CCTV cameras may help the employees escape this situation
Premises.P8: the customers know very well that their conversations are recorded
Premises.P9: at some offices, employees are often required to handle angry or frustrated customers
Premises.P10: face-to-face interactions with an annoyed customer can put the employee in physical danger
Premises.P11: one must realize that safety is of paramount importance compared to privacy and prevention is always better than suffering from the consequences
Premises.P12: opponents of this system should try to comprehend the situation and take actions to prevent themselves from being victims of crime
Premises.P13: the videotapes can used to determine what actually took place and further actions can be then taken
